data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Aqaba, Jordan to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aqaba, Jordan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Aqaba, Jordan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Aqaba unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Aqaba access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, Saudi - Najdi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, Saudi - Najdi people.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Aqaba, Jordan today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 139,200 people living in the state of Aqaba.
Father, please give the church in the state of Aqaba prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
